title: Why is this allowed?
body:
I played a ranked game recently that had a Leblanc that went mid and built AD. She fed then blames bot lane for being the reason she fed. I don't understand why there are people that play off-meta things in ranked games. It's fine if you play them in normals but in ranked, you're effecting your whole team if you lose. It's so easy for someone to troll and get away with it and that isn't fair on players that are negatively impacted by it.

This isn't the first time someone has done that before. I've had Taric jg, who ran straight into 3 people then blamed bot lane for not following up even though we were pushed in and low hp from the amount of poke we were taking. I've vsed against a JG Zyra who did quite well early game but ended up trolling late game. 

Why is it that one person has the power to ruin/lose a game just by locking in a troll pick or by running it down mid? 

I'm not saying that you automatically lose when someone runs it down mid because I've recovered from one of those games, where a Yi got upset that we accidentally took his blue and then came to our lane and fed. 20 mins later, he's 3 shotting their carry and we won that game. I was extremely lucky that the Yi had a change of heart but some people aren't as fortunate and end up losing lp/promos.
